app_properties.must_bundles: org.apache.felix.framework, org.apache.commons.lang, org.apache.commons.pool, jackson-core-asl, jackson-mapper-asl, org.apache.felix.bundlerepository, org.apache.felix.configadmin, org.apache.felix.fileinstall, org.osgi.compendium, org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api, org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-service, com.github.ipaas.ifw.util, com.github.ipaas.ifw.core, com.github.ipaas.ifw.mq, com.github.ipaas.ifw.quartz, com.github.ipaas.ideploy.filemonitor
